doc.title: Working a Long Tom Rocker on Bonanza Creek
doc.plot: This is one of the processes of separating the gold from the pay dirt. Two men are seen shoveling the pay dirt into the rocker, another is working the rocker, while a fourth is shoveling away the tailings or the broken bed rock after the gold has been washed from it. The water is seen running into the rocker and rushing down the sluice.
